title: ICT-Based Expert Training Program for Oral Health and Dental Caries Management

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Personalized learning utilizing VR simulations and Web 2.0/3.0 tools in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments

learning_goals: Oral anatomical structures and dental caries development mechanisms can be explained based on scientific principles
Dental caries prevention and treatment procedures can be performed with 90% accuracy through VR simulations
Personalized oral care plans can be developed and evaluated for patients using ICT tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
